creator: blakest@diebold.com
text:
The web-app doctype defined by http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_2.dtd 
specifies that the servlet-mapping as:

<!ELEMENT servlet-mapping (servlet-name, url-pattern)>

However, the web.xml file generated by JspC using the -webinc and -webxml 
options has the servlet-name and url-pattern elements in reverse order.

BTW - Shouldn't the DOCTYPE in the constants string 'jspc.webxml.header' be 
updated to use the latest web-app DTD located at http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-
app_2_3.dtd?

[PATCH] Updates to messages.properties and messages_es.properties for new web-
app doctype.

cvs diff -u messages.properties (in directory D:\Tomcat4-cvs\jakarta-tomcat-4.0
\jasper\src\share\org\apache\jasper\resources)
Index: messages.properties
===================================================================
RCS file: /home/cvspublic/jakarta-tomcat-
4.0/jasper/src/share/org/apache/jasper/resources/messages.properties,v
retrieving revision 1.19
diff -u -r1.19 messages.properties
--- messages.properties	2001/07/12 23:29:33	1.19
+++ messages.properties	2001/09/07 17:05:35
@@ -186,7 +186,7 @@
 \n\
 <!DOCTYPE web-app\n\
 \    PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.2//EN"\n\
-\    "http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_2.dtd">\n\
+\    "http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-app_2_3.dtd">\n\
 <!--\n\
 Automatically created by Tomcat JspC.\n\
 -->\n\

*****CVS exited normally with code 1*****

cvs diff -u messages_es.properties (in directory D:\Tomcat4-cvs\jakarta-tomcat-
4.0\jasper\src\share\org\apache\jasper\resources)
Index: messages_es.properties
===================================================================
RCS file: /home/cvspublic/jakarta-tomcat-
4.0/jasper/src/share/org/apache/jasper/resources/messages_es.properties,v
retrieving revision 1.7
diff -u -r1.7 messages_es.properties
--- messages_es.properties	2000/11/08 00:09:26	1.7
+++ messages_es.properties	2001/09/07 17:05:57
@@ -165,7 +165,7 @@
 \n\
 <!DOCTYPE web-app\n\
 \    PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.2//EN"\n\
-\    "http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_2.dtd">\n\
+\    "http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-app_2_3.dtd">\n\
 <!--\n\
 Automatically created by Tomcat JspC.\n\
 -->\n\

*****CVS exited normally with code 1*****
creator: blakest@diebold.com
